newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Ruby Tuesday rating raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Ruby Tuesday rating raised.

text.p: --EVEREN Securities Inc said Tuesday it raised its six-month rating on Ruby Tuesday Inc to outperform from market performer.
--Same-store sales in the core Ruby Tuesday concept are turning positive with the introduction of the new value menu, analyst Dean Haskell noted in a report.
--EVEREN raised its six-month price target on the stock of the specialty restaurant company to $19 from $17. It also lifted its earnings per share view for FY97 to $1.32 from $1.30.
